sentences.sContent: This gives you the opportunity to pray for and bless the other thereby blessing yourself.
sentences.sContent_eng: This gives you the opportunity to pray for and bless the other thereby blessing yourself.
sentences.sCn: 它其实是给了你一个机会，去为他人祈祷和祝福，从而赐福给你自己。

sentences.sContent: However, doing so would dramatically expand the message payload of the service, thereby possibly impacting its performance profile.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, doing so would dramatically expand the message payload of the service, thereby possibly impacting its performance profile.
sentences.sCn: 然而，这样做会显著扩展该服务的消息有效负载，从而可能影响其性能状况。

synos.tran: 从而，因此；在那附近；在那方面

words.tran: 在那里；在那边；在那点上
在那上面，在其上；…之后立即
